name: Warm Blessings in Cold Nights
description:
A WebGL Build is available right here: Click here for WEB GL

I wasn't able to submit this version during Jam time, so I uploaded it to one of my old game pages. but it is the exact same game as in the mac build. Enjoy!

The goal of the game is to grow the yellow glowing blessings faster than the corrupted orbs. there are markings on the ground where you can place the blessing on to, there's different marking configurations, some a bit easier than others. Have fun!

Controls:

- WASD

- Mouse

- Create blessings by pressing X

- Pick Blessings up by pressing space on them or clicking

- Drop Blessings onto a Dot on the ground by clicking again

- Blessings replicate, make sure they grow better than the corruption!
